Class ServiceHttpClientFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.http.client.ServiceHttpClientFactory

  • @Factory
public class ServiceHttpClientFactory
extends Object
    Creates HttpClient instances for each defined ServiceHttpClientConfiguration.
